text: The Encased Redstone Pillar is a block that acts exactly as a Redstone Block, but only along its axis.
This means that it will only power blocks that are directly touching the ends of it, and not to the sides.
This can be useful for creating more compact redstone contraptions, or for creating more complex redstone circuits.
$(li)Quartz: For standard use cases. It's pretty.
$(li)Ancient Debris: For when you need a little more durability. It's not so pretty.
